title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account.
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still...

title: Payment Failed - Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234 but the payment keeps failing despite sufficient balance.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Customer requested a new feature to add a dark mode option to the application's user interface.

title: Unable to Download Invoice
description: A user's account was mistakenly suspended, and they are seeking clarification and reinstatement.

title: General Inquiry About Service Plan
description: A potential customer has questions about the pricing and features of different service plans.

title: Data Sync Failure
description: Several users reported that their data is not syncing correctly between the desktop and mobile apps.

title: In-app Notification Issue
description: Notifications are not being displayed for a specific group of users. Requires investigation.

title: Website Performance Slowdown
description: Users are experiencing slow loading times on the main dashboard, especially during peak hours.

title: Customization Request
description: Customer wants to know if they can customize the email templates for their automated notifications.

title: Missing Invoice Inquiry
description: Customer is missing their last month's invoice and requires it to be resent to their registered email address.
